references.paper_title: Language2pose: Natural language grounded pose forecasting
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the work in this paper because it introduces the concept of using natural language to forecast poses, which is directly relevant to generating corrective instructions for human motion.

references.paper_title: TEACH: Temporal action composition for 3D humans
references.reason: This paper presents a method for generating diverse human motion sequences based on text descriptions, which is directly relevant to this paper's task of generating corrective instructions based on motion editing.

references.paper_title: Generating diverse and natural 3D human motions from text
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for generating high-quality 3D human motion sequences conditioned on text, which is directly related to the core task of this paper.

references.paper_title: TM2T: Stochastic and tokenized modeling for the reciprocal generation of 3D human motions and texts
references.reason: This paper is important because it provides a framework for reciprocal generation between motion and text, which is the core concept of this paper which is generating motion corrective instructions from motion pairs.

references.paper_title: MotionCLIP: Exposing human motion generation to CLIP space
references.reason: This paper's method is used for motion generation and editing in this paper which is a relevant and important method for creating datasets of motion pairs and corresponding corrective instructions.
